description.short: Cloud storage and file sharing app with cross-device access, Google Drive integration, and WebRTC technology.
description.full: StoAmigo was a file sharing and cloud storage platform that allowed users to access files stored on any device from their phone, without upload times or size limits. The company started with CloudLocker, a crowdfunded physical private cloud storage device, and evolved into a cross-platform file sharing solution. I worked on the Android app, developing a new architecture for the file system, integrating Google Drive, and creating a WebRTC prototype for real-time peer-to-peer file sharing. The company later rebranded to AXEL in 2018 with a focus on blockchain technology.
